papers.title: Socialization in Open Source Software Projects: A Growth Mixture Modeling Approach
papers.relevance: Examines how socialization processes in OSS projects lead to role transitions and team growth through mentorship

semantic_scholar_match.title: Socialization in Open Source Software Projects: A Growth Mixture Modeling Approach

citations.reasoning: These papers provide empirical evidence for the reinforcing mechanism of team growth through mentorship and promotion in OSS communities.
